posts.post_content:
I've posted my prewar trade list. It has a little bit of everything from Old Judge to 41 Goudey. PM or email me at [url]obcjohn@gmail.com[/url]. My wantlist URL is
[url]https://sites.google.com/site/bamaswantlists/[/url]. At this time I only want to trade for cards on my prewar wantlist.

John

PreWar Trade List
1941 Goudey: 16, 29
1938 National Pastime Pins: Chiozza, Demaree, Gehringer, Greenberg, Hartnett, Hubbell, Lewis, Mancuso, Ott, Simmons, Schumacher, Terry, Trosky
1938 Goudey Knot Hole: 11, 15, 20 (2)
1937 Dixie Lids: Foxx, Hubbell
1937 OPC: Kelley (PSA4) Kuhel (PSA3) West (PSA4) Dickey (intact front staining) Grove (top missing)
1936 World Wide Gum: 27, 54, 57 (Hartnett), 83, 113 (Appling), 116
1936 R313 Fine Pen: Becher, Collins, Derringer, Fox, Gowdy, Lavegetto, White Sox Team, Grove, Hoyt, Chicago city series, Jensen, Simmons, Higgins, Bolton, Big bosses clash, Wagner/Brenen, Andrews, Foxx/Simmons/Cochrane, Cammilli, Bordagary/Earnshaw, Hallahan
1933 Sport Kings: 5 (Wachter)
1933 World Wide Gum (French/English back): 2 (Vance), 14, 38, 42 (Collins), 52
1932 Caramel Presidents: Tyler, Van Buren
T201: Fitzpatrick/Killian
T205: Marquard (PSA1)
E91-A: Bridwell Davis Hartsell
E91-B: Hartsell
E95: Krause
E101: Bergen
1914 Coupon Type 2: Doolan, Balt. Fielding
Williams Caramel: Tommy Leach
1910 Old mill Series 3: Robertson
Old Judge: Gerhardt, New york
Sporting Life: Lennox
W514: Collins
W516-1: Adams, Doyle, Milan, Nehr
W517: Casey, Collins, Hafey, Rausch
Tom Barker cards : 8 Action Cards plus Stallings

Hi John,
I don't have anything on your wantlist but wanted to say hello from Cloverdale/Garden District!  Didn't realize there was somebody else in Montgomery on Net54.
Chris
